price: موسى وويل: د ختيځ، لويديځ او د هغو تر منځ شيانو رب دى، كه تاسو عقل كاروئ.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi wamā baynahumā in kuntum taʿqilūna
